rukus.text: He (muhamada) kapare nu (apane apa ute) lapetana vale
Rata nu kharhe hovem paratu thorhi rata (rahide)
Adhi rata jam usa tom vi kujha ghata kara devo
Jam usa tom kujha vadha devo ate kura'ana nu ruka-ruka ke paro
Asim tuhade upara bhari hukama utarana vale ha
Besaka rata nu uthana behada aukha hai ate gala thika nikaladi hai
Besaka tuhanu dine bahuta kama rahida hai
Ate apane raba da simarana karom ate sari'am tom alaga ho ke usa vala dhi'ana kendarita kara lavo
Uha puraba ate pachama da malaka hai, usa tom bil'ham ko'i pujanayoga nahim. So tusim usa nu apana sabha kujha bana lavom
Ate loka jihara kujha akhade hana usa te dhiraja rakho ate cage tarike nala unham tom alaga ho javo
Ate jhuthala'una vale sapana lokam da mamala mere te chada di'u ate unham nu thorhi jihi dhila de devo
Sade kola beri'am ate naraka hai
Ate sagha vica phasana vala bhojana hai ate dukhada'ika saza hai
Jisa dina dharati te pahara hilana laganage ate pahara digade ho'e reta vanga dhera ho janage
Asim tuhade vala ika rasula bheji'a hai, tuhade te gavaha bana ke, jivem asim phira'auna vala ika rasula bheji'a si
Phira phira'auna ne rasula da kahina na mani'am tam asim' usa nu sakhata pakara nala pharha li'a
Tam jekara tusim inakara kita tam usa dina di saza tom kivem baconge jihari baci'am nu budha bana devegi
Jisa vica asamana pata ja'ega besaka usa (alaha) da va'ada pura ho ke rahega
Iha ika sikhi'a hai, isa la'i je caho tam apane raba vala (jana vala) raha apana lavo
